descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3]UPLOADED V4 LEVEL RESTRICTED (NO DRAGONS BEFORE LEV. 5 ... MORE AS YOU LEVEL UP ...
 UPLOADED V3 LEVEL RESTRICTED AS V4 LEVEL RESTRICTED BUT WITHOUT THE TWEAKS FOR DRAGONS AND DRAGON PRIESTS .
         
         
short description : dragons in many new places and from game beginnings ... as of version 4 they are much more powerful and the dragon priests too and the dragons are level restricted so the added ones will not appear before level 5 ... and things will get worse as you level up ...


[/size][/color][size=3] [/size]                                                                                           




                                                                                       [color=#00ff00][size=6]   [color=#f9cb9c]DRAGONS[/color][/size][/color][color=#00ff00][color=#f9cb9c]
                                                                                                    


                                                                                                 [b] FROM THE BEGINNINGS                                                                                                             OF YOUR ADVENTURE[/b] [/color]
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      [size=4]                                                                          [color=#00ffff][size=3]more dragons
                                                                        IN MANY NEW PLACES[/size][/color][/size][/color]
                                                                                      
                                                      
                                         
[i][color=#00ff00][color=#ff7700][size=4][color=#ffff00]         [b][size=3]                          [color=#00ffff]i like to find dragons to fight from the beginning of the game and more
                                   of them around the map so i don't have to go to the top of the mountains
                                                               or to remote places to fight them ...
[/color][/size][/b][/color][/size][/color][/color][/i][i][b][color=#00ff00][size=3]                                     [/size][color=#00ffff][size=3]in version 4 the already added dragons and all dragons are tweaked ,
                                                                 they are much more powerful .
                               i tweaked them in a particular way and that to enjoy long epic dragon battles
                                                   but without having to die every five seconds .
                                             [size=2](alduin paartunax odhaving durnheviir and [color=#ff0000]mermulnir[/color] are not changed) .
                                       [size=3]in version 4 all the seven dragon priests are also tweaked (.. nahrkin too)
                                                     and in the same way as i tweked the dragons
                                                        (much longer and more enjoyable fights) .[/size]

[/size]

[color=#f9cb9c]general description :      
[/color][/size][/color][/color][/b][/i][color=#f9cb9c]

[i][b]More dragons, in many new places , and from the beginnings of your game , they are now friendly only to dragon priests , so they will fight all the other factions , wolfs bears ... etc .

[/b][/i][/color]
[color=#f9cb9c][i][b][color=#f4f4f4][color=#f9cb9c][i][b]notes[/b][/i] :

[/color][/color]Should be compatible with everything .[/b][b]

installation : unzip the downloaded file to your Skyrim data folder , or install it with mo , activate it , run loot ... happy hunting .

to uninstall delete DRAGONS.esp , rerun Wrye Bash if you are using it and you included my mod in it .

a little advice : you'll end up with many dragon souls ... you can use "dragon soul relinquishment" to spend them for perks , attributes , shout cool down , shout power ... (more reasons to hunt dragons) , ( the possibility to convert them to perk points is already included in dd if you are using it and only want that ) . if it happens that sometimes you don t absorb a dragon soul from the dead dragon ( it s not from this mod anyway ) there s a mod here on the nexus that gives the player on activation a power to absorb it from a dead dragon that didn't give one .

requirements : Skyrim last version .[/b][/i][/color]

[color=#f4f4f4][color=#f9cb9c]

[/color][i][b][color=#f9cb9c]if you don't see dragons in new places that means that you added the mod in mid game , while there is no problem with that but you ll have to wait some time before they appears or reset world cells , you can use the option available in dd for that or sic if you are using any of them .
another thing , at the beginning of the game you normally don't find dragons near external dragon walls until you progress with the main
story , these dragons ( the ones that have to appear near dragon walls only ) will not be activated until then  .

note  :[color=#ff0000] [size=2]all versions are script-free[/size] .[/color][/color][/b][/i][/color]

[color=#00ffff][i][b][size=3]
check my other mod "with purple to violet[/size]" .
[/b][/i][/color]
[color=#00ffff][i][b][color=#00ffff][i][b][size=3]check my other mod "Bandits Glory[/size]" .
[/b][/i][/color]
[/b][/i][/color]
[size=3][color=#00ffff][i][b]
